name: UIContentContainer
desc: A set of methods for adapting the contents of your view controllers to size and trait changes.

items.name: func viewWillTransition(to: CGSize, with: UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinator)
items.desc: Notifies the container that the size of its view is about to change.

items.name: func willTransition(to: UITraitCollection, with: UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinator)
items.desc: Notifies the container that its trait collection changed.

items.name: func size(forChildContentContainer: UIContentContainer, withParentContainerSize: CGSize) -> CGSize
items.desc: Returns the size of the specified child view controller’s content.

items.name: func preferredContentSizeDidChange(forChildContentContainer: UIContentContainer)
items.desc: Notifies an interested controller that the preferred content size of one of its children changed.

items.name: func systemLayoutFittingSizeDidChange(forChildContentContainer: UIContentContainer)
items.desc: Notifies the container that a child view controller was resized using auto layout.

items.name: var preferredContentSize: CGSize
items.desc: The preferred size for the container’s content.
